title: Notices of Violation issued by the Department of Building Inspection
description: These records indicate the actual violations and comments by the inspector found during the inspection. The data should be sorted on the Complaint Number field and the Item Sequence Number field. The user should be able to link this file with the Department of Building Inspection Complaints dataset to get a more accurate picture of the violations.

columns.name: Complaint Number
columns.description: Identifier for complaint

columns.name: Item Sequence Number
columns.description: Use this number to sort item correctly within the complaint number

columns.name: Date Filed
columns.description: Date that the complaint was filed

columns.name: Status
columns.description: The current status of the complaint (active or not active)

columns.name: Receiving Division
columns.description: The division that initially received the complaint

columns.name: Assigned Division
columns.description: The division that is currently assigned to the complaint

columns.name: NOV Category Description
columns.description: This field is a generalized category for the violation

columns.name: Item
columns.description: This field indicates specific ordinances that have been violated

columns.name: NOV Item Description
columns.description: This field indicates actual comments about the violation

columns.name: Location
columns.description: Derived from EAS addresses, or parcel centroid (block+lot)

columns.name: point_source
columns.description: Source for the geographic location (i.e. EAS or parcel centroid)

columns.name: Work Without Permit
columns.description: Work is done at location without an issued permit

columns.name: Additional Work beyond Permit
columns.description: Additional work is being done beyond scope of permit

columns.name: Expired Permit
columns.description: Permit has been expired

columns.name: Cancelled Permit
columns.description: Permit has been cancelled

columns.name: Unsafe Building
columns.description: Unsafe building

columns.name: Code Violation Description
columns.description: Description of code violations

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp data was updated in the source system

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp data was loaded to the open data portal

columns.name: Supervisor Districts 2
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Supervisor Districts' (rxqg-mtj9) the point in column 'location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
